name: Giorgio Armani My Way
description: Notes: Bergamot, orange blossom, tuberose, vanilla. Why it fits: Soft pink juice and delicate floral vibes.

name: Versace Bright Crystal
description: Pomegranate, peony, magnolia, musk. Iconic pink bottle, light and bright floral scent.

name: Hugo Boss The Scent for Her
description: Peach, freesia, osmanthus, cacao. Sleek, feminine pink-hued bottle.

name: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet
description: Peony, rose, white musk. Soft pink fragrance liquid, delicate floral fragrance.

name: Chanel Chance Eau Tendre
description: Grapefruit, quince, jasmine, white musk. Pastel-pink juice; fresh and airy composition.

name: Gucci Bloom
description: Jasmine, tuberose, Rangoon creeper. Elegant white-pink minimalist bottle with a very floral heart.

name: Chloé Eau de Parfum (Signature)
description: Peony, rose, lychee, cedar. Soft pink ribbon, romantic aesthetic.

name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Eau So Fresh
description: Raspberry, grapefruit, wild rose, musk. Fun, floral fragrance with a pastel/pinkish hue and white daisy cap.

name: Marc Jacobs Daisy Love
description: Cloudberry, daisy, driftwood, cashmere musk. Adorable pink tint in the bottle with the signature daisy topper.

name: Coach Floral Eau de Parfum
description: Pineapple sorbet, rose tea, gardenia, patchouli. Soft pink bottle, fresh floral scent.

name: DKNY Be Delicious Fresh Blossom
description: Grapefruit, rose, jasmine, apple. Pale pink apple-shaped bottle; crisp, fruity-floral aroma.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris
description: Strawberry, raspberry, pear, peony, patchouli. Elegant bow and pink juice, romantic vibe.

name: Lancôme La Vie Est Belle
description: Iris, praline, pear, vanilla. Rose-hued fragrance liquid and a clean, luminous design.

name: Miu Miu L’Eau Rosée
description: Blackcurrant, lily of the valley, musk. Soft pink matte glass, delicate floral musk.

name: Prada Candy
description: Caramel, musk, vanilla, benzoin. Chic pink-and-gold packaging with a sweet, feminine vibe.

name: Victoria’s Secret Bombshell
description: Passion fruit, peony, vanilla orchid. Signature pink-striped bottle with a fresh, fruity-floral scent.

name: Ariana Grande Sweet Like Candy
description: Berries, whipped cream, marshmallow, vanilla. Pastel-pink round bottle with a playful pom-pom.

name: Tiffany & Co. Rose Gold
description: Blackcurrant, blue rose accord, ambrette seed. Subtle blush-hued bottle, luxe yet fresh floral.

name: Guerlain Mon Guerlain Bloom of Rose
description: Bulgarian rose, lavender, neroli, vanilla. Romantic pink liquid; airy and floral interpretation of the original.

name: Chloé Nomade
description: Oak moss, cherry plum, freesia, mirabelle. Soft nude/pink bottle with a clean white cap (often perceived as pinkish hue).
